title: Soft Magnets Promise To Make Electric Motors 3 Times Lighter
excerpt: Researchers from the Carnegie Mellon University have developed soft magnetic materials that promise to make electric motors up to four times lighter.

title: Opposites Attract: A Review of Basic Magnetic Theories - Technical Articles
excerpt: Electric machineries are based on the basic principles of electromechanical conversion, which use either the electrostatic or the electromagnetic principle. This technical article deals with the magnetic circuit theory for the conversion of one form of energy to another.
